# Support

## Getting Help

Thank you for using Cheltenham Open Data! If you need help or have questions, here are the best ways to get support:

### Documentation

* Check the [README](../README.md) for general information about the project
* Review the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guide if you want to contribute

### Issue Tracker

If you've found a bug or have a feature request, please check if it's already been reported in our [issue tracker](https://github.com/mat-0/cheltenham-open-data/issues).

If your issue is new:
1. Use the GitHub issue search to check for similar issues
2. Create a new issue using the appropriate template
3. Provide as much detail as possible to help us understand your problem

### Community

* Follow [@MatBenfield](https://github.com/MatBenfield) on GitHub
* Visit [TheChels.uk](https://thechels.uk) for more information

### Response Time

This is a community-maintained project. Response times may vary, but we'll do our best to respond to issues and questions as quickly as possible.

## What NOT to Report

* Please do not use the issue tracker for personal support requests
* For security vulnerabilities, please follow the process outlined in [SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md)
